website_summaries.verdict: Good choice if you're looking for an hourglass that is both decorative and affordable.
pros: Sleek metal frame and smaller size make this a good gift or office decoration
Stands 7 inches tall and runs for 15 minutes
cons: Feet may be uneven and sand may stop running occasionally

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Cheap, Cheap - Really Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, this is one cheap, cheap, cheap 15 min timer hourglass! I am so disappointed I bought this. It looks great from afar, but it is so cheap! When the sand gets down to the last few moments the sand stops going through, so all of the sand does not go through. It must not have enough weight for the last minutes worth of sand to go through. Other people who have left one star reviews are spot on, I have no idea how anyone else could leave a review of anything less than one star?
customer_reviews.author: Spudulite

customer_reviews.title: Adds a bit of flair ⏳
customer_reviews.text: I used this as decor only, and not for time measurement. It does actually function very well. It's slightly shorter than a popular TV Remote as pictured. Appears to have no flaws. I'm satisfied with this so far, it was INexpensive and available on Prime so I consider it a good deal. ⏳
customer_reviews.author: TennisAce

customer_reviews.title: A TOUCH OF ELEGANCE AND CHARM
customer_reviews.text: This timer is an excellent motivator. When I really don't want to "do anything", I can set this timer and it encourages me to get up and move - if only for 15 minutes. But by that time I want to keep moving and accomplish my goals for that day. It is accurate...maybe not to the second, but plenty close enough for me. It looks good in any household and any decor. The brass looks as though it has been in my home for many years and blends well no matter where I choose to put it. I highly recommend this hourglass.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredDinker2

customer_reviews.title: The best value you will find in a 15 minute hourglass
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this hourglass is its very attractive appearance. It is well designed and is sturdy and robust. The sand takes 15 minutes to go from top to bottom The price of $10 is hard to believe considering the value of this marvelous device. Right, it will never replace my wristwatch but it looks much better..I cannot stop admiring this marvelous device.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Mckechnie

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by this hourglass! It is made of sturdy materials, doesn't appear flimsy when handling at all, operates as it should, and is stunning in display. It made a beautiful graduation gift for my daughter, one I can easily see being proudly displayed on a shelf or her desk one day.
customer_reviews.author: MyssChryss

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, Buy a different Hourglass.
customer_reviews.text: Looks much better in the picture, What I received was not level to the point I just threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Willey

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had a small cheap hourglass many years ago but a neighbor had just taken in a foster child and he was very shy and afraid. When he came over his eyes picked up on it and he cling to it. I decided he needed it more than I. I had meant to replace it but just hadn't gotten around to it. I saw this at Amazon while I was shopping for something else - it is just what I needed. So happy with this purchase. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! It was packed well in it’s own box ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It was packed well in it’s own box with styrofoam inserts. The gold/brass color is nice and the glass is well made. It’s large enough to get noticed on a shelf or table too. Most importantly it measured a true15 minutes according to my iphone timer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dohna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's beautiful and sits on my piano. We use it for so many things. Practice piano, read for 15 min, play with your sister while I shower, do this, do that.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL HOURGLASS
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this hourglass. Let's be honest here - it's for ornamental purposes. It is well made for that. I have it on my mantel and it looks quite nice and very classy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Bookhound

customer_reviews.title: Sand got stuck!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this one. Sand got stuck, never seen something like this... Plus, screws were totally loosen and unstable. Don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Boheme

customer_reviews.title: Wonky.
customer_reviews.text: Sand clogs while falling. Also, top and bottom aren’t level so it’s kinda wonky. You’ll have to position it just right so it doesn’t look stupid. When you position it right it looks good tho haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak glass
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but first time I picked it up the glass broke from the slight pressure of my fingers and I had to trash it. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Eagleguy

customer_reviews.title: I TESTED IT THREE TIMES, IT WAS 15 SECONDS ...
customer_reviews.text: I TESTED IT THREE TIMES, IT WAS 15 SECONDS SHORT OF TEN MINUTES 9:45 THE FIRST TIME, 15 SECONDS OVER (10:15) AND THIRTY SECONDS OVER THE THIRD TIME I TESTED IT 10:30....ITS NOT A 15 MIN GLASS...IT'S TEN
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful hourglass. It is a plastic glass but very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful hourglass. It is a plastic glass but very strong plastic and looks just like glass. Everyone notices it and loves it. I don't mind my granddaughter playing with it because the glass will not break easy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Glass not secured
customer_reviews.text: The glass part isnt secured to the frame so it could pop out at any time
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The hour glass part is small and when I received it it was broken and hanging out of the holder. The metal holder is uneven and made poorly.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Too bad I dropped it the same day I received it and the glass broke! Beautiful accent for the house!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Holds up after 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Its not rocket science, its an hourglass, its does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Second Options

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not working properly. Sometimes the sand sticks to the glass after being flipped. Sand drops stops in the middle. I am not happy with the product. If you are looking for a good sand clock that works well, I do not recommend you to buy this one
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty. The only thing wrong is the minutes
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty. The only thing wrong is the minutes...instead of being 15 minutes it is only for 12 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte M. Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I truly needed this..... I have an open door policy but I have to limit folks sometimes. This serves the purpose and looks great on my desk!
customer_reviews.author: LD2

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for redecorating my son's bathroom from kid themed to adult. Added a masculine touch.

customer_reviews.title: The hourglass are bent
customer_reviews.text: I received the hourglass as described, but it's bent, looks Ok.. bot I think it is a simile of pizza tower

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay if you want something that just blends into the background. Personally, I wanted more shine!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: This hourglass is really nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: This hourglass is really nice looking!!! Will look great on the shelves in my living room. It was missing one of the gummy pieces that fit on each end to protect your furniture.

customer_reviews.title: Teach time to a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old loves it. Now to introduce the idea of this is how much time you have left before bed. Not bad construction, the rubber feet were worthless and peeled off right away but no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rodesch

customer_reviews.title: Love it everybody that Shop is in the house makes note of it and I’ll complement it
customer_reviews.text: Love it everybody that Shop is in the house makes note of it and I’ll

customer_reviews.text: It said 15 min. timer and I have tried 3 times and only get 13 mins.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit lighter than I expected. But it looks very nice.

customer_reviews.text: Wanted an accurate houtglass & this 15 minute one was perfect for my Granddaughter.

customer_reviews.text: Great for my display and great to use it for my kids need a time out, when they see it they freaked out....lol to them 15 minutes takes forever just for doing nothing in the corner.

customer_reviews.text: if you are using this for decoration, then buy it. If you are actually going to use it as a 15 minute timer. DO NOT. It clog constantly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: but looks even better in person

customer_reviews.text: The hour glass arrived with out any sand. Therefore it is rendered useless. I was very irritated.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than I expected, but maybe that's ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I expected, but maybe that's my fault for not reading. The "columns" on the side, are lose and move to the touch. Feels cheap... I did pay $15 for it though.

customer_reviews.title: LAZY Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Sand never falls fully through and always always always gets stuck halfway through the cycle. Terrible.

customer_reviews.title: The receiver really liked it. Very beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for an eighteen-year-old. The receiver really liked it. Very beautiful and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: While attractive, this product came loose and fell apart ...
customer_reviews.text: While attractive, this product came loose and fell apart immediately. The glass fell out of the metal frame and broke.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the hour glass for a girlfriends birthday gift and she LOVES IT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Clap clap
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty cool I just don’t know the exact time the sands will last

customer_reviews.title: That it could be defective
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way it looked. But some impossible way, the sand gets stuck and never drains completely. 😶😶😶

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice looking decorative piece
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this was a 1 hour sand timer - it was not. It is a nice looking decorative piece.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my home office. The quality is excellent. If I bought this at a store I would have paid alot more. Classy....

customer_reviews.title: The materials are good and I can combine it very well

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: I use this to time medication before I eat.. I love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece I purchased to go on my way table
customer_reviews.author: Marcellas

customer_reviews.title: Hour glass for child.
customer_reviews.text: I have an hour glass that my friend's 8 year-old son loves. So, I decided to get him one for his upcoming birthday. I think both the size and amount of time for the timer will be perfect for him!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Good looking item
customer_reviews.text: Well built hour glass that transfers sand from the top to the bottom then repeats itself over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Captain's Hourglass
customer_reviews.text: I haven't timed this to see if it's accurate but I have found it to be effective for deciding when to jump into crisis situations at work! Turn it over, allow the team to troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: DcG

customer_reviews.title: Nice little hourglass
customer_reviews.text: Sturdily built, no loose or broken parts in shipment. Looks nice as a knickknack but I haven't calibrated the sand falling so I don't know if it's accurate or not,
customer_reviews.author: Barry S

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Came a little damaged on one side but it's not very noticeable. I kept the item as it works great. I heard other hourglasses on Amazon have problems with the sand going through.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdana

customer_reviews.title: The top and bottom feet are screws - different than what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Other customers have noted that this is cheap - but it's $16, so maybe they had high expectations? It still looks nice sitting on a shelf. The one thing that I am disappointed in is the three nodes on each side that serve as the feet. In the product image, they appear to be hemispheres - perfectly rounded orb sections. This was not the case for the item I received - they are, in fact, screws. Quality expectations are one thing but the product that arrived was actually different than what arrived, and that's problematic. I'm keeping it because I'm not placing it in a prominent spot where it will be immediately visible, but it's still a misleading image.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice 15 minute sand timer. It's as accurate as you'd expect from a sand timer. I've been bringing it at meetings at work to try to time box discussions more effectively. The sand timer is kind of fanciful and less obnoxious than other kinds of timers you could use for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Don N

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted but sand stops sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and a nice size, solid in the hand. However, the sand would stop sometimes, getting jammed. It seems this happens more on one side than the other, so the glass inside may be rough or something. We are hoping if we keep turning it and moving sand through it, it will wear down any rough spots. It is also a 30 minute hourglass, if you care about the actual time. Otherwise, the piece is really very nice looking and a pleasure to hold, examine.
customer_reviews.author: SoHappy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality timer
customer_reviews.text: Quality timer that is better than expected from the pictures. It actually has a good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these, 1 as a gift. I've liked it really well, and while I've never timed it to see how accurate it is, I think it's probably close to the 15 minute mark. A little cheap in terms of construction, but looks nice enough and a good visual reminder for me to sit and write in my business journal a couple times each week for 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JackbNymbull

customer_reviews.title: needed it for a photo
customer_reviews.text: I belong to a photo scavenger hunt and the theme for one of the words was TIME! This was absolutely perfect! I know I will use it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Borell

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a costume, saving for decor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband's Father Time costume for this coming Halloween. It's quite lovely and I have it sitting on an end table as decoration until Halloween. I wouldn't buy it for kids because I think it's real glass, but it's a nice curio item.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hourglass. Finely crafted Elegant AND Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the hourglass. Solid with quality material. Is a beautiful decoration or conversation piece and the hourglass timing can be precisely calibrated to a known time interval. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Whovian Raj

customer_reviews.title: Best nik nak
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute in my black, white and gold office. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb C

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Small
customer_reviews.text: I order this and thought it was bigger from the picture. Then I saw the different sides. This is a office desk one for fifteen minutes in both sides. It is very nice,gold. Looks like it comes from art studio. I would buy has gifts for Christmas or Annivsary for people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my son, he likes it, his children love it

customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute artifact! I haven't timed the sand though, but it appears to work well. I use it more for looks than utility though.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price. The threads in the bases ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price. The threads in the bases were cut a little course, so it rattled a bit. Nothing some RTV couldn't cure. Solid now.
customer_reviews.author: Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quarter hourglass, but some stand sticks
customer_reviews.text: Does work, but some sand sticks to upper bulb, requiring a tap to get the rest to pass through -- usually only a small amount. Build quality is otherwise very nice, but it is frustrating that one has to tap the glass.

customer_reviews.title: Still like the product
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I was expecting, my fault for not reading the size. Still like the product.

customer_reviews.title: Timely pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Well, it doesn't go *ping*

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and exactly as pictured. It was packed very carefully and we had no problems with it. It will look great on our bookshelves!

product_meta.title: Benzara Metal/Glass Quarter Hourglass with 15 Minutes Time Interval
product_meta.description: The small spaces in office and home filled with nice looking sculptures support the interior decoration with unique natural blend. 58155 METAL/GLASS QUARTER HOURGLASS is a 15 Minute Nautical Ship Sand Timer Metal Hour Glass.
feature_bullets: Material: rust free premium grade metal alloy and glass
Must to have for maritime collector

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars310 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Wipe Clean with a Damp Cloth
